This resource will oversee them all and oversee to completion SDWAN implementation.Minimum (Required): insert specific minimum skills for this Contract Position)Years Skills/Experience• 8+ Years: Experience in delivering network projects, and products in a highly technical dispersed multi-team environment (of those 8 years, we would like at least 5 in Network project management).• 8+ Years: Experience to engage multiple technical teams to drive consistent expectations towards Project goals.• 8+ Years: Knowledge of Network Infrastructure.• 8+ Years: Possess strong verbal and written skills in communicating with peers and different levels of users including executive staff.• 8+ Years: Skilled in facilitating large group meetings with internal and external resources.• 8+ Years: Skilled in collaborating with the technical and functional teams to develop the Technical Specification and other documents need in support of the solution.• 8+ Years: Experience in implementing Enterprise Systems IntegrationPreferred (Optional): insert specific preferred skills for this Contract Position)Years Skills/Experience• Experience with SDWAN projects• Experience with one or more of the state of Texas government agencies• Experience with multivendor and professional services.• PMP certification.
